Package clientSide.stubs

Class GeneralReposStub

  • java.lang.Object
    • clientSide.stubs.GeneralReposStub
  • public class GeneralReposStub
extends java.lang.Object
    Stub to the general repository. It instantiates a remote reference to the general repository. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.

    • Constructor Summary
